title: Check on Case Appeal Status
description: A client wants to know the status of their appeal. A paralegal needs to check the appellate court's docket.

tasks.description: Identify the case name and docket number for the appeal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct case identifiers.

tasks.description: Access the appellate court's online docketing system (e.g., PACER for federal courts).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs into the court's system.

tasks.description: Search for the case docket and review the most recent entries to determine the current status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the case has been scheduled for oral argument next month.
